title: Big Data in Cloud Computing and Internet of Things
abstract: The topic of big data has attracted outstanding and increasing attention in recent years. Cloud computing and Internet of Things (IoT) are two hot topics and have become parts of our daily lives. Besides, these technologies allow to collect huge amounts of data nowadays. In this study, the relationship between big data, cloud computing and IoT is investigated. The main aim of this study is to provide general information to the researchers who will work in this field.
venue: 2019 3rd International Symposium on Multidisciplinary Studies and Innovative Technologies (ISMSIT)

journal.name: 2019 3rd International Symposium on Multidisciplinary Studies and Innovative Technologies (ISMSIT)
